summary: The implementation successfully addresses all 11 requirements (REQ-95 through REQ-105). The ETRMembership component was created with all specified feature cards, pricing display, and proper integration into App.tsx. Chatbot responses were updated to include ETR Everyday membership information. However, REQ-97 has a minor discrepancy: the feature card heading is '24/7 roadside assistance' instead of the required '247 service' heading.

missing_requirements.requirement: Feature card for '24/7 roadside assistance' should have the heading '247 service' (not '24/7 roadside assistance')
missing_requirements.reason: The acceptance criteria specifies 'Feature card displays "247 service" as the heading' but the implementation shows 'title: "24/7 roadside assistance"' in the features array

hallucinated_features.description: Decorative gradient background elements and animations in ETRMembership component
hallucinated_features.reason: The component includes decorative gradient blobs, blur effects, and pulsing animations that were not requested in the build requirements

hallucinated_features.description: Membership Program badge with animated pulse indicator
hallucinated_features.reason: The inline badge with 'Membership Program' text and animated pulse dot was not specified in any requirement

hallucinated_features.description: Gradient text styling for 'ETR Everyday' heading
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request specifies using the red, white, and blue color palette but does not request gradient text effects (bg-gradient-to-r from-primary via-accent to-primary)
